items.q: Which type of RNA brings amino acids to the ribosome during translation?
items.explanation: Transfer RNA specifically matches an anticodon with an amino acid.

items.q: The fluid mosaic model describes the structure of the Golgi apparatus.
items.explanation: It describes the structure of the cell membrane (plasma membrane).
The pulmonary artery carries deoxygenated blood to the lungs.

items.q: What specific phase of meiosis is responsible for crossing over (genetic recombination)?
items.explanation: Homologous chromosomes pair up and exchange genetic material.

items.q: What hormone, produced by the pineal gland, helps regulate the sleep-wake cycle?
items.explanation: Its levels rise in the evening to promote sleep.

items.q: In ecology, what principle states that two species competing for the exact same resources cannot stably coexist?
items.explanation: One will eventually outcompete the other.

items.q: What enzyme found in saliva begins the chemical digestion of carbohydrates?
items.explanation: It breaks starch into smaller sugars.

items.q: What cellular structure, found in both eukaryotes and prokaryotes, synthesizes proteins?
items.explanation: They are complex molecular machines essential to life.

items.q: What is the terminal electron acceptor in the electron transport chain during aerobic respiration?
items.explanation: It combines with electrons and protons to form water.

items.q: What specific class of antibodies is most commonly involved in allergic reactions?
items.explanation: They bind to allergens and trigger histamine release from mast cells.
